analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose the reimplementation of Schedule F as proposed in Docket ID: OPM-2025-0004, "Improving Performance, Accountability and Responsiveness in the Civil Service" and strongly urge the Office of Personnel Management to reject this rule and protect the integrity of the merit-based civil service system.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule and emphasizes the importance of protecting the merit-based civil service system, indicating concerns about politicization and due process for employees.
